entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
